snippet.title: Supplice Episode 3 Release Date Announcement
snippet.description:
Gear up! Supplice is getting an update!

Play it NOW on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1693280/Supplice

And by update, we mean a massive content expansion!

What's in the package?

- A whole new episode to explore!
- A new weapon!
- Fierce new enemies to challenge your skills!
- Ice walls to shatter and break through!

Mark your calendars for June 27th – you don't want to miss this epic expansion!


-----------------------------------------------------


Supplice is a stylish throwback shooter inspired by the mid-90s FPS glory days and the legendary Doom modding community. Mixing the retro stylings of 90s era shooters with colorful graphics and frantic gameplay, it creates an experience that's ever so familiar but also exciting and fresh.


Survive, adapt, and strike back! Get it now on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1693280/Supplice


Supplice and Supplice logo © Mekworx 2021
Hyperstrange and Hyperstrange logo © Hyperstrange S.A.
